appBackups.title: Backup management
appBackups.desc: Application backup is a complete backup of the metadata, persistent data, and version data of the current application. Backup records can be used for application migration and rollback, and cloud backup records can be used for cross-cluster application migration
appBackups.table.pages.is_configed: The data is backed up to the cloud storage system for cross-cluster migration
appBackups.table.pages.no_configed: An enterprise administrator needs to configure the OSS cloud object storage in enterprise Settings
appBackups.table.pages.label.tooltip.tit: The data is backed up to the local directory of the current cluster and cannot be migrated across clusters
appBackups.table.pages.abnormal.custom: If the component uses user-defined storage, determine whether to forcibly back up data
appBackups.table.pages.abnormal.not_stop: If there is an exception in the backup, determine whether to forcibly back up stateful components
appBackups.table.pages.model.migration: The current backup mode is local and cannot be migrated across clusters
appBackups.table.pages.migration.title: Migration
appBackups.table.pages.migration.teamOrC: Select teams and clusters to migrate
placeholder.app_not_name: The application to be created does not have a name
notification.hint.migration.loading.desc: Please wait while migrating (do not close the popup)
notification.hint.migration.warning.aler: Local backups cannot be migrated across clusters
notification.hint.recover.loading: Recovering, please wait (do not close the window)
notification.hint.recover.success.delete: The recovery was successful. Do you want to delete the current application?
notification.hint.recover.alert: Do you want to restore the backup to the current cluster?
notification.hint.recover.warning.contin: Your current application is not fully recovered. Would you like to continue?
notification.hint.confiuration.update.ti: Components need to be updated to take effect
confirmModal.backup.delete.desc: Are you sure you want to delete this backup?
UploadComponent.file.name: filename
UploadComponent.vsNum: The version number format is incorrect
UploadComponent.vsNum.length: The version number cannot exceed 64 characters
UploadComponent.img.format: The image address format is incorrect
UploadComponent.upload.repeat: Only jar and tar.gz files can be uploaded
UploadComponent.del.no: After being deleted, it cannot be restored
